component.name: listCustomDimensions
component.description: Retrieve a list of customDimensions from GoogleAnalytics account.

component.name: createCustomDimension
component.description: Create a new customDimension in GoogleAnalytics account using the provided Parameters.

component.name: getCustomDimension
component.description: Retrieve details of a customDimension identified by the provided customDimension ID.

component.name: updateCustomDimension
component.description: Update details of the customDimension identified by the provided customDimension ID.

component.name: patchCustomDimension
component.description: pdates an existing custom dimension. This method supports patch semantics.
